alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Huron; Lorain; Medina; Portage; Richland; Stark; Summit; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 3:52PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Portage, northeastern Richland, Huron, Medina, Ashland, Stark, southern Summit, Wayne and southwestern Lorain Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 351 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wakeman to Creston to Hartville. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rainfall, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Akron, Canton, Mansfield, Medina, Wooster, Ashland, Norwalk, Cuyahoga Falls, Massillon, Kent, Barberton, Green, Wadsworth, Tallmadge, North Canton, Louisville, Orrville, Rittman, Wellington and Mogadore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Huron; Lorain; Medina; Portage; Richland; Stark; Summit; Wayne
